message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $1000000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me is $1000000.

I understand you're looking to negotiate further, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to make an offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $925000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $800000, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $825000 is a more reasonable price for the product. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $825000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $925000 and $825000, which would be $875000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $800000.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $875000 is the best price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $875000 and $825000, which would be $850000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1000000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to $850000. I'm willing to make a new offer, $900000, which is a compromise between our previous offers. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $800000.

I appreciate your willingness to make another offer, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go up to $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900000 and $825000, which would be $862500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1000000.

I understand you're trying to find a middle ground, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $862500. I'm willing to make one final offer, $887500, which is a compromise between our previous offers. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $800000.

Alice, I understand you're trying to make a fair deal, but I'm not willing to go above $862500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1000000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.
